- Fix SSH connections being refused after some time for OpenSSH 9.8p1+ servers for VMs due to multiple connection attempts
- Fix old OpenSSH clients not accepting "none" for "PKCS11Provider", causing dlopen issues on those systems 
- Add option to open AWS web dashboard from XPipe
- Improve fallback behaviour when local shell failed to start
- Fix various performance issues
- Fix HTTP API not supplying CORS headers for web-based API clients
- Fix hibernation behaviour setting not persisting
- Fix category collapsed state always resetting
- Fix laggy user interface when resizing window while the settings menu was open
- Fix SSH config identity detection not working for patterns in host entries
- Fix connection entry index not being able to be cleared
- Fix various NullPointers
- Fix connection index changes not syncing properly
- Fix custom SSH agent setting not always overriding other agents configured in SSH config
- Fix mstsc certificates trust status not persisting for tunneled RDP connections
- Fix vscode-based editors not working when cmd.exe was disabed on the system
